Description: This educational session will start with an overview of strategies to assess tractability of novel targets (B. Turunen). We will then move to two approaches that have shown success in drugging poor tractable targets: PROTACs (C. Nasveschuk) and DEL (K. Billings).  The rationale for leveraging these liganding approaches, with examples of successes as well as challenges, will be highlighted by researchers with deep experience in their application.
Location: New Orleans Theater A, Convention Center
SearchResultBody: ED007. Advances in Ligand Discovery Against Poorly Tractable Targets
SearchResultFooter: New Orleans Theater A, Convention Center
Title: Advances in Ligand Discovery Against Poorly Tractable Targets
